properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_TITLE, MEM_ID, BRD_DEL_FL FROM V_BOARD ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_TYPE, BRD_NO, REPORT_CATE_NO, MEM_ID FROM V_REPORT ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
